Open Referral Data Specifications
  • HTTP Routing Table

HTTP Routing Table

/ | /organizations | /service_at_locations | /services | /taxonomies | /taxonomy_terms
 
/
GET / Retrieve information about this API and its relationship with HSDS.
 
/organizations
GET /organizations Paginated list of basic Organization information
GET /organizations/{id} Fully nested organization with service array that contains simple information which could only contain the service.id.
 
/service_at_locations
GET /service_at_locations Retrieve paginated listings of service_at_location that only have one-to-one fields in them.
GET /service_at_locations/{id} Retrieve fully nested service_at_location with all related data with specified id.
 
/services
GET /services Retrieves paginated listings of services that only have one-to-one fields in them.
GET /services/{id} Retrieves a fully nested service with all related data with id.
 
/taxonomies
GET /taxonomies Paginated listing of taxonomies.
GET /taxonomies/{id} Retrieves full information on a taxonomy by {id}.
 
/taxonomy_terms
GET /taxonomy_terms Paginated listing of taxonomy terms
GET /taxonomy_terms/{id} Full information on a taxonomy term.
